name: One Life (Kid Genius)
description:
You trust your life in the hands of other players. Literally. You have been cursed by The Gunsmen to share a life with other players. You must survive with your friends until you beat the final boss, The Gunsmen. Can you beat the game. Try it and find out

In this game, you are sharing a life with other players on the server. This is a LAN game. 

Instrctions:

1. To install, just extract the zip folder

2. All devices must be connected to the same wifi hotspot

3. Host device should host the server

4. Use the command prompt to find the IP Address and share it with the other players. Do not worry bout being hacked, this is just your local IP Address

5. Connect to the server and enjoy

Tutorial:

W, A, S, D to move up, left, down, and right respectively

R to reload

Q to drop your weapon

H to use the health pot

E to pick up items and weapons and open chests

This game is only for windows, has not been tested on other platforms
